name: 黃如瑩
objective: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以專題演講及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。

Seminar on “critical terms” and “concepts”
~with Prof. Vinia Huang
Mondays (2011 Fall)
For 2nd year MA students, English Dept., NTUT
I.Suggested critical terms and conceptsfor the students to choose from:
social linguistics,representation, structure, writing, discourse, narrative, figurative language, performance, author, interpretation, intention, unconcious, determinacy and indeterminacy, value and evaluation, influence, rhetoric, culture, canon, literary history, gender, race, ethnicity, ideology, etc.
